item.title: Sharing components between two view models in C# MVVM
item.description: Reqruiement I have two view models - MainViewModel and OptionViewModel -, that share a common component CustomConfiguration. My goal is to load the data into MainViewModel in MainWindow, and when the Option button ic clicked on MainWindow, OptionWindow will be opened, and the CustomConfiguration data will be passed into it.
